Question
========
  
It is examined whether the level of self-confidence affects the level of self-regulation. Self-regulation and self-confidence are each measured on a 5-point Likert scale. This is an example of: 
Answerlist
----------
* Univariate statistic with self-confidence as dependent variable.
* Univariate statistic with self-confidence as the independent variable.
* Bivariate statistic with self-confidence as dependent variable.
* Bivariate statistics with self-confidence as the independent variable.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
